roleset.name: to polish or soften
roleset.note: BUFF-V NOTES: Frames file for 'buff' based on survey of sentences in the WSJ corpus. Verbnet entry 10.4.1.frame by Perryn (from buff.01-v predicate notes)

example.name: transitive
example.text: Nevertheless, the company said [0] [shipments]-1 were up slightly to 679,000 metric tons from 671,000, *trace*-1 buffing the impact of the unexpected earning decline.
example.arg: the impact of the unexpected earning decline
